about

I am a multidisciplinary developer and designer based in California. I build visual identities, UI/UX, and function for websites.

Mountain biker, food enthusiast, gearhead, guitarist, and brand builder. I work as a Regional Account Manager, creating websites on the side. Currently 6 years of experience in client facing roles. 9 years of experience learning, studying, and utilizing Korean.
